elements.name: better_prepared_unit4
elements.title: I feel better prepared to teach Unit 4 after attending this workshop.

elements.name: better_prepared_unit5
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 5 (I feel prepared to teach concepts such as lists, loops and traversals).

elements.name: better_prepared_unit6
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 6 (I feel prepared to teach concepts such as algorithms, their efficiency, and the characteristics and uses of different types of algorithms).

elements.name: discuss_roadblocks_successes_m4
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss CS Discoveries course implementation roadblocks and successes with peers during this module.

elements.name: opportunities_discuss_peers_m4
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss teaching strategies with peers during this module.

elements.name: question6
elements.html: The following two questions refer to using data to address barriers and opportunities to promote equity in your CS classroom:

elements.name: understand_how_to_use_data
elements.title: I understand HOW TO use data to address barriers and opportunities to promote equity in CS in my classroom.

elements.name: motivated_to_use_data
elements.title: I am MOTIVATED TO use data to address barriers and opportunities to promote equity in CS in my classroom

elements.name: question6
elements.html: After attending this workshop I feel prepared to...

elements.name: promote_active_participation
elements.title: Promote students’ active participation in the classroom through learning by doing and exploration.

elements.name: promote_communitication_skills
elements.title: Promote students’ communications skills through active contribution to group work.

elements.name: support_early_finish_fall_behind
elements.title: Support students who finish early and also those who fall behind during projects.

elements.name: support_problem_solving_processs
elements.title: Support students using the Problem Solving Process for Design to solve complex problems.

elements.name: question6
elements.html: After attending this workshop I feel prepared to...

elements.name: influence_academic_status
elements.title: [use strategies that allow me] to influence a student’s academic status in the classroom.

elements.name: foster_different_ways_contribute
elements.title: foster different ways in which students can contribute in the classroom.

elements.name: engage_different_math
elements.title: engage students with different math backgrounds.

elements.visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles' or ({workshop_course}='CS Discoveries' and {workshop_id} <> '11840' and {workshop_id} <> '12271' and {workshop_id} <> '12121' and {workshop_id} <> '12594')
elements.name: strategies_ensure_inclusion_m4
elements.title: This workshop provided me with new ideas and strategies to ensure that my classroom is inclusive.

elements.name: prepared_to_do_formative_assessment
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I am better prepared to utilize formative assessments in the CS Discoveries curriculum to support learning.

elements.name: discuss_giving_feedback
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss giving meaningful and concise feedback to students.

elements.name: use_rubrics_summative_assessments
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I have a deeper understanding of how rubrics are used to summatively assess students in the CS Discoveries curriculum.

elements.name: prepared_to_do_summative_assessments
elements.title: After participating in this workshop, I am better prepared to utilize summative assessments in the CS Discoveries curriculum to support learning.

elements.name: peer_discussion_sample_project_summative_assessments
elements.title: Through the opportunity to score and discuss a sample student project with my peers, I feel better able to define what success looks like in my classroom and use it for summative assessments.

elements.name: understand_role_of_asssessment
elements.title: I understand the role of assessments as opportunities to provide feedback to promote continuous growth.
